attributes.action: stop sending uk tax payers money abroard
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We,the UK tax payer,work dam hard for a living,only to find our tax that you the Government take off us,goes abroard,ie,to poor countries that cannot or never will afford to repay.What is the point of all this?its like the govrnment giving everyone here in the UK £10,000 for nothing and not to pay it back and leaving a very large gap in the repayment books. You might as well throw government money right out of the window,because that's how it looks.No one gives money away for nothing and nither should this government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
